name: 喻沐英
objective: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
schedule:
Week 1: Power of Music
Week 2:  POwer of Music
Week 3:  My World / Conversation practice
Week 4: Past events  
Week 5: Past events / Literature article
Week 6: 兒童節
Week 7: Feelings and opinions
Week 8: Feelings and opinions / Adjectives practice
Week 9: Midterm Exam
Week 10:What if...
Week 11:What if...
Week 12: Work it out
Week 13: Work it out
Week 14: Work it out
Week 15: Looking back
Week 16:Looking back / Festival
Week 17: 端午節
Week 18: Final Exam
scorePolicy:
期中 30%
期末 30%
課堂練習及對話  20%
出席及作業  20%
